alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Western Addison; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 12:11AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, southwestern Addison and northwestern Rutland Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1211 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Benson, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Crown Point, Cornwall, Sudbury, Weybridge, Salisbury, Orwell, Benson, Whiting, New Haven, West Castleton, Addison, Shoreham, Leicester, West Haven, Castleton, Waltham, Bristol, Fair Haven, and Panton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Western Addison; Western Rutland
